idea-plugin.name: Groovy
idea-plugin.description: Adds support for Groovy language, including Grape and Gant.

registryKey.description: Substitute console file name with selected module/version for this console file
Enables Document based formatting instead of PSI based
Whether to skip substitutor computation if return type doesn't depend on it
Whether to throw error if the element is unexpected in resolve processor

localInspection.displayName: Unchecked assignment from members of raw type
Conditional expression can be conditional call
If statement with too many branches
Switch statement with no default case
Access to static field locked on instance data
Non-private field accessed in synchronized context
Call to Thread.stop(), Thread.suspend(), or Thread.resume()
Synchronization on variable initialized with literal
Method with more than three negations
Result of increment or decrement used
Local variable is reassigned in closure or anonymous class
Call to Map.get can be keyed access
Call to Map.put can be keyed access
Call to List.get can be keyed access
Call to List.set can be keyed access

group.description: Run the compiler for Groovy files in resource roots to check for compilation issues

action.description: Run the incremental compiler for Groovy files in resource roots to check for compilation issues
Run the compiler for all Groovy files in resource roots to check for compilation issues
Don't generate Java stubs for this Groovy file on compilation
Action generates equals and hashCode now
